mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.nickname, u.profile_image_url AS profileImageUrl FROM users u JOIN ( SELECT CASE WHEN first_user_id = #{userId} THEN second_user_id ELSE first_user_id END AS user_id FROM friends WHERE status = 'ACCEPTED' AND (first_user_id = #{userId} OR second_user_id = #{userId}) ) f ON u.user_id = f.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, nickname, joined_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{joinedAt})
